TAUCOEFF_NC2BIN.F90 Program Documentation

Last modified: Thu Sep 9 17:42:36 2004.

 NAME:
       TauCoeff_NC2BIN

 PURPOSE:
       Program to convert netCDF format TauCoeff files to the RTM binary
       format.

 CATEGORY:
       CRTM : Coefficients : TauCoeff

 LANGUAGE:
       Fortran-95

 MODULES:
       Type_Kinds:                 Module containing definitions for kinds
                                   of variable types.

       File_Utility:               Module containing generic file utility
                                   routines.

       Error_Handler:              Module to define simple error codes and
                                   handle error conditions
                                   USEs: FILE_UTILITY module

       TauCoeff_Define:            Module defining the TauCoeff data
                                   structure and containing routines to
                                   manipulate it.
                                   USEs: TYPE_KINDS module
                                         ERROR_HANDLER module
                                         COMPARE_FLOAT_NUMBERS module

       TauCoeff_Binary_IO:         Module containing routines to read and
                                   write Binary format TauCoeff files.
                                   USEs: TYPE_KINDS module
                                         FILE_UTILITY module
                                         ERROR_HANDLER module
                                         TAUCOEFF_DEFINE module

       TauCoeff_netCDF_IO:         Module containing routines to read and
                                   write netCDF format TauCoeff files.
                                   USEs: TYPE_KINDS module
                                         ERROR_HANDLER module
                                         TAUCOEFF_DEFINE module
                                         NETCDF module
                                         NETCDF_UTILITY module

 CONTAINS:
       None.

 INCLUDE FILES:
       None.

 EXTERNALS:
       None.

 COMMON BLOCKS:
       None.

 FILES ACCESSED:
       - Input netCDF TauCoeff data file
       - Output RTM binary format TauCoeff file.

 SIDE EFFECTS:
       The output file is overwritten if it already exists.

 RESTRICTIONS:
       None.

 CREATION HISTORY:
       Written by:     Paul van Delst, CIMSS/SSEC 02-Apr-2003
                       paul.vandelst@ssec.wisc.edu
